desserts.name: Nutella Crepes
desserts.description: Thin crepes filled with Nutella, folded into triangles and sprinkled with powdered sugar. Served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of ladyfingers soaked in coffee and liqueur, mascarpone cream, and dusted with cocoa powder.

desserts.name: Apple Pie
desserts.description: Classic apple pie with a buttery crust, filled with caramelized apple chunks and sprinkled with cinnamon.

desserts.name: Crème Brûlée
desserts.description: Velvety smooth custard dessert with a crunchy caramelized sugar layer on top.

desserts.name: Tempura Ice Cream
desserts.description: Ice cream wrapped in a thin tempura batter and deep-fried, served with hot chocolate sauce.
